text:
The title element for the insertAsset.jx template from the FCKeditor module is
collapsed into short form. This is due to the lack of a title field in the jx
template. The collapsing into short form causes IE to not work on the page. A
better title might be picked, but this does prevent the collapse.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 19009
Puts a space in the title.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text:
fixed in svn, thanks!
would you mind checking other usecases for this IE problem as well? we might
have some more of those problems lurking.... (i'm leaving the bug open for now.)
creator: nettings@apache.org
rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
There are 37 candidates where problems may exist (missing page:title elements).
Mostly in administration and sitemanagement, which I don't think are a problem.
I will review for further instances and post an update sometime this week.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 19023
Fixes collapsing titles

Fixes usecases that result in collapsed titles upon rendering. Use i18n:text
elements to do the replacing. Fixes original FCKeditor patch to use i18n:text.

The following usecases were rendered with collapsed title elements. Some of
these caused problems with IE, all of them are not XHTML compliant.

src/modules/resource/usecases/upload-resource.jx
src/modules/cforms/usecases/dynamicrepeater_template.xml
src/modules/opendocument/usecases/upload.jx
src/modules/tinymce/usecases/insertAsset.jx
src/modules/fckeditor/usecases/insertAsset.jx
src/modules/bxe/usecases/insertAsset.jx

The following are still offending and are not fixed in the patch. However, they
are rendered under a different context and do not pose a problem right now.
Perhaps they should be fixed as well.

modules-core/administration/usecases/addGroup.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/addIPRange.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/addUser.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/changePasswordAdmin.jx

modules-core/administration/usecases/deleteUser.jx

modules-core/administration/usecases/group.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/groupMembers.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/groupProfile.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/groups.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/ipRangeGroups.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/ipRange.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/ipRangeProfile.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/ipRanges.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/serverStatus.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/sessions.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/siteOverview.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/userGroups.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/user.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/userProfile.jx
modules-core/administration/usecases/users.jx
modules-core/sitemanagement/usecases/tab/ac/ac.jx
modules-core/sitemanagement/usecases/tab/assets.jx
modules-core/sitemanagement/usecases/tab/meta.jx
modules-core/sitemanagement/usecases/tab/overview.jx
modules-core/sitemanagement/usecases/tab/revisions.jx

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text:
I applied the patch, thanks a lot!
Should we close this bug for now?
creator: andreas@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
fine with me. i'm closing it for now. pls reopen if another issue like these
crops up...
